notes_bg_to_de: 'Паричка' е женски род. Money. Plural: пари

notes_bg_to_de: Глаголът 'gehen' означава 'вървя/отивам'. Внимавайте с формата 'ich gehe', а миналото време е неправилно: 'ich ging', Partizip II 'gegangen'. | Основна дума.
notes_de_to_bg: Für Deutschsprachige: 'Ходя' ≈ 'gehen'. Bulgarisches Verb. Sehr häufig verwendet. | Grundwort.
etymology: Bulgarian verb derived from Slavic root. Infinitive form ends in -м (first person singular present) | Proto-Slavic or international.
cultural_note: Essential action word. Bulgarian verbs conjugate for person and number | Common word.
linguistic_note_de_to_bg: Bulgarian verbs conjugate for person, number, and tense. Perfective/imperfective aspect distinction important | Grundwort.

notes_bg_to_de: 'Der Kühlschrank' е сложна дума ('kühl' + 'Schrank'). Множественото е 'die Kühlschränke'. Израз: 'etwas in den Kühlschrank stellen'. | Основна дума.
notes_de_to_bg: Für Deutschsprachige: 'Хладилник' ≈ 'Kühlschrank'. Maskulinum. Häufig verwendet. | Grundwort.
etymology: Bulgarian noun from Slavic root. Definite article is postfixed in Bulgarian | Proto-Slavic or international.
cultural_note: Common everyday word in Bulgarian. Useful for A2 learners | Common word.
linguistic_note_bg_to_de: Bulgarian noun. Gender: Check ending (-ъ/-й usually masculine, -а/-я feminine, -е/-о neuter). Definite article suffix: -ът/-та/-то | Основна дума.
linguistic_note_de_to_bg: Bulgarian noun. Gender: Check ending (-ъ/-й usually masculine, -а/-я feminine, -е/-о neuter). Definite article suffix: -ът/-та/-то | Grundwort.

notes_bg_to_de: 'Das Ticket' е неутрално; синоним в транспорта е 'die Fahrkarte'. Израз: 'ein Ticket kaufen'. | Основна дума.
notes_de_to_bg: Für Deutschsprachige: 'Билет' ≈ 'Ticket'. Bulgarisches Wort. Häufig verwendet. | Grundwort.
etymology: Slavic origin word. Related to other South Slavic languages | Proto-Slavic or international.
cultural_note: Bulgarian public transport system includes buses, trams, metro (Sofia) | Common word.
linguistic_note_de_to_bg: Bulgarian word at word level. Pay attention to stress and pronunciation | Grundwort.
